<style type="text/css">
.column, .floatcols {
float: left;
width: 49%;
padding: 0;
margin: 0;
}

.column-wrapper {
overflow: hidden;
}

ul#mylistid{
width: 100%;
padding: 0;
}

li.subject_link {
padding:2px 0;
margin: 2px 6px;
list-style-type: none;
font-size: 1.15em !important;
}

li.subject_link:hover {
background: #eee;
cursor: pointer;
}

a.toggle_button {
text-decoration: none;
text-align: center;
color: #666;
background: #ddd;
border: 1px solid #ccc;
font-weight:bold;
margin: auto 6px auto 0;
padding:1px 3px;
display:inline-block;
width:15px;
cursor: pointer;
}

span.toggletext {
cursor: pointer;
}

ul.guide_links li {
margin:3px 3px 3px 26px;
list-style-type:disc;
}

ul.guide_links {
margin: 6px 0;
padding: 0;
line-height 1.5em; 
}

<!-- jquery.columns was written by Karl Swedberg. See the file source for more attribution information -->
<script src="http://demo.libguides.com/data/custom/1/jquery.columns.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
// Contributors: Dan Brubaker Horst, Laura J. Harris, thorbroo (#code4lib), Erin R. White, Derik Badman.
// Code is licensed under a Creative Commons Atrribution license: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/us

//compatibility mode for $ namespace (which might get used by other js libraries) better to use jQuery in these cases
jQuery.noConflict();

// Wrapping with: (function($){ ...code...})(jQuery); replaces '$' with 'jQuery'.
(function($){
$(document).ready(function() {
$('#myScript').remove();
// creates the columns through the column plug loaded above
$('.mylist').columns({columns: 2}); 

// 'hide' function is called on each of the 'ul' elements with the class 'guide_links'
$('ul.guide_links').hide();

// DOM insert a link element inside of each of the subject list items.
$('li.subject_link').prepend('<a href="javascript://toggle guide links" class="toggle_button">+</a>');

// enable toggle action on each Subject LI
$('li.subject_link').bind("click", function(){
// toggles text in the link between '+' and '-'.
if($(this).children('a.toggle_button').text() == '+'){
$(this).children('a.toggle_button').text('-');
} else {
$(this).children('a.toggle_button').text('+');
}
// Toggle the child 'ul' element
$(this).children('ul.guide_links').slideToggle("fast");
});

$('a.subject_link_a').contents().unwrap();

});
})(jQuery); 
</script>        
			<style>
				div.roundbox { border-radius:5px; -webkit-border-radius:5px; -moz-border-radius:5px; }
			</style>

					try {
                        jQuery("div.roundbox").corner("5px");
                    } catch (e) {}
				});
			</script>

                                            <div id="wrapbox1055926">
	<div class="roundbox outerbox" id="1055926">
		
		<div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title1055926">
			
			<div class="bi_links">&nbsp;</div>
			<h2>Children's Literature
			</h2>
		</div>
			
		<div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content1055926"><p><font size="4" style="font-size: medium;"></font></p>
<p><font color="#800080"><b><font face="book antiqua,palatino" size="3">Artwork that fuels a child's imagination...</font></b><br /></font><font face="arial,helvetica,sans-serif" size="2">See these children's author and illustration web sites for award winning books:</font></p><div id="boxatt1055926" class="boxatt"><div class=itemlist><ul><LI id="link3058013"><a id="link_3058013" href="http://www.cla.ca/AM/Template.cfm?Section=Book_Awards&Template=/CM/HTMLDisplay.cfm&ContentID=8805" target="_blank" onclick="hit(3058013,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Children\'s Literature and the Art Curriculum', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 3058013}); ">Canadian Library Association Children's Literature Awards</a><div class=linkdesc></div></LI><LI id="link3057986"><a id="link_3057986" href="http://www.bookcentre.ca/awards/governor_generals_literary_awards" target="_blank" onclick="hit(3057986,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Children\'s Literature and the Art Curriculum', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 3057986}); ">Governor General's Literary Awards</a><div class=linkdesc></div></LI><LI id="link3089516"><a id="link_3089516" href="http://www.bookcentre.ca/awards/elizabeth_mrazikcleaver_canadian_picture_book_award" target="_blank" onclick="hit(3089516,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Children\'s Literature and the Art Curriculum', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 3089516}); ">Elizabeth Mrazik-Cleaver Award for Illustration in Children's Literature</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<div id="popupinfo3089516" class="popupdiv"></div><a href="#" onClick="cursorXY(event); showAlert(250,3,3089516,0); return false;"
								title="More Information"><div class="b_moreinfo">&nbsp;&nbsp;</div></a><div class=linkdesc></div></LI><LI id="link3089528"><a id="link_3089528" href="http://www.bookfair.bolognafiere.it/en/illustratori/premio_illustrazione" target="_blank" onclick="hit(3089528,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Children\'s Literature and the Art Curriculum', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 3089528}); ">Bologna Children's Book Fair</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<div id="popupinfo3089528" class="popupdiv"></div><a href="#" onClick="cursorXY(event); showAlert(250,3,3089528,0); return false;"
								title="More Information"><div class="b_moreinfo">&nbsp;&nbsp;</div></a><div class=linkdesc></div></LI><LI id="link3057979"><a id="link_3057979" href="http://www.ala.org/ala/mgrps/divs/alsc/awardsgrants/bookmedia/caldecottmedal/caldecottmedal.cfm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(3057979,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Children\'s Literature and the Art Curriculum', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 3057979}); ">Caldecott Medal - American Library Association</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<div id="popupinfo3057979" class="popupdiv"></div><a href="#" onClick="cursorXY(event); showAlert(250,3,3057979,0); return false;"
								title="More Information"><div class="b_moreinfo">&nbsp;&nbsp;</div></a><div class=linkdesc></div></LI><LI id="link3058010"><a id="link_3058010" href="http://www.ala.org/ala/mgrps/rts/emiert/cskbookawards/recipients.cfm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(3058010,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Children\'s Literature and the Art Curriculum', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 3058010}); ">Coretta Scott Kind Award - American Library Assoc.</a><div class=linkdesc></div></LI><LI id="link3057982"><a id="link_3057982" href="http://www.ezra-jack-keats.org/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=67&Itemid=66" target="_blank" onclick="hit(3057982,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Children\'s Literature and the Art Curriculum', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 3057982}); ">Ezra Jack Keats Award</a><div class=linkdesc></div></LI><LI id="link3057968"><a id="link_3057968" href="http://www.scbwi.org/Pages.aspx/Current-News?2010-Golden-Kite-Awards-Announced" target="_blank" onclick="hit(3057968,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Children\'s Literature and the Art Curriculum', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 3057968}); ">Golden Kite Awards</a><div class=linkdesc></div></LI><LI id="link3057966"><a id="link_3057966" href="http://www.scbwi.org/Illustrators-Gallery.aspx" target="_blank" onclick="hit(3057966,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Children\'s Literature and the Art Curriculum', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 3057966}); ">Society of Children's Book Writers & Illustrators : illustrators gallery</a><div class=linkdesc></div></LI><LI id="link3565534"><a id="link_3565534" href="http://www.scbwi.org/Pages.aspx/Sid-Fleischman-Award" target="_blank" onclick="hit(3565534,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Children\'s Literature and the Art Curriculum', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 3565534}); ">Sid Fleischman Award</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<div id="popupinfo3565534" class="popupdiv"></div><a href="#" onClick="cursorXY(event); showAlert(250,3,3565534,0); return false;"
								title="More Information"><div class="b_moreinfo">&nbsp;&nbsp;</div></a><div class=linkdesc></div></LI></ul></div></div>
		<div id="box_comments_1055926" style="padding-top:5px;" class="font11 box_comments">
		</div>
		<div id="commentslistb1055926" style="display:none;"></div>
		</div>
	</div></div>
                                        </div>
                                        
                                    </div><div id="contentcenter" style="width:600px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; float:left;">
                                        
                                        <div id="centerboxes">
                                            <div id="wrapbox1351904">
	<div class="roundbox outerbox" id="1351904">
		
		<div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title1351904">
			
			<div class="bi_text">&nbsp;</div>
			<h2>Books and Art
			</h2>
		</div>
			
		<div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content1351904"><p><a target="_blank" href="http://en.childrenslibrary.org/" title="ICDL - International Children's Digital Library"><img src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/data/imagemanager/11932/international_childrens.png" style="vertical-align: middle;" /></a> <b><font size="3" color="#800080" face="helvetica"></font></b></p>
<p><b><font size="3" color="#800080" face="helvetica">Why use children's literature in the art classroom?</font></b></p>
<p>"Every school and public library is a treasure house of small works of art-- picture books. The texts of some of these books are brief gems of polished prose worthy of study as a form of literature in their own right. But more important... each good picture book displays a set of well-produced works of art, carefully designed for the space provided.&nbsp; ...Combining the wealth of art available in picture books with references to both art "masterpieces" and the folk and popular art of the world around them, students can begin to learn the language of art." (<a target="_blank" href="http://www.library.ualberta.ca/permalink/opac/1996874">Picture Books for Looking and Learning: Awakening visual perceptions through the art of children's books</a> by Sylvia S. Marantz)</p>
<p><b>Alberta Education Teachers Resource Manual:</b> Appreciating Art (Reflection) "Have students search for illustrations in children&rsquo;s literature that provoke strong feelings for them personally.&rdquo;</p>
<p>Children relate easily to the illustrations /artwork in books meant for their level.</p>
<p>Linked image above from ICDL.&nbsp;The mission of the <a target="_blank" href="http://en.childrenslibrary.org/">International Children&rsquo;s Digital Library Foundation</a> is "to excite and inspire the world's children to become members of the global community &ndash; children who understand the value of tolerance and respect for diverse cultures, languages and ideas -- by making the best in children's literature available online."</p><div id="boxatt1351904" class="boxatt"></div>
		<div id="box_comments_1351904" style="padding-top:5px;" class="font11 box_comments">
		</div>
		<div id="commentslistb1351904" style="display:none;"></div>
		</div>
	</div></div>
                                        </div>
                                        
                                    </div>				</div>
                
<div id="footer" >
	<div id="footer_topline">

  	</div>
